aircraft.value: Heron Surveillance - AC-9578-185 at Sector North Station

defect_observed.value: Wing spar corrosion detected. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.

root_cause.value: Wear beyond serviceable limits due to extended operational hours

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Wing Structure component. Inspection revealed damage to critical components.

corrective_action.value: Adjust calibration settings to manufacturer specifications

preventive_action.value: Update technical documentation with lessons learned

remarks_investigation.value: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.

remarks_design.value: Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent. Date: 05/07/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. R.P. Singh

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality assurance review completed. Recommend enhanced incoming inspection criteria for this component type. Date: 08/07/2024 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational usage reviewed. Component operated within prescribed limits. Concur with investigation outcome. Date: 06/07/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Regulatory quality requirements verified. Proposed actions meet airworthiness standards. Recommend approval. Date: 12/07/2024 Signature: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable. Date: 14/07/2024 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh

a) Root Cause Analysis: Wear beyond serviceable limits due to extended operational hours
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Wing Structure component. Inspection
revealed damage to critical components.
c) Remedial Measures Adjust calibration settings to manufacturer specifications
